mapper.select: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN LEVEL_NO = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "LEVEL_1", SUM(CASE WHEN LEVEL_NO = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "LEVEL_2", SUM(CASE WHEN LEVEL_NO = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "LEVEL_3" FROM GAME_LOG

WITH DATES AS ( SELECT TRUNC(SYSDATE) - LEVEL + 1 AS "date" FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= #{days} ) SELECT TO_CHAR(D."date", 'MM-DD') AS "LABEL", (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GAME_LOG G WHERE TRUNC(G.START_TIME) <= D."date") AS "VALUE" FROM DATES D ORDER BY D."date" ASC

WITH DATES AS ( SELECT TRUNC(SYSDATE) - LEVEL + 1 AS "date" FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= #{days} ) SELECT TO_CHAR(D."date", 'MM-DD') AS "LABEL", COUNT(CASE WHEN G.LEVEL_NO = 1 THEN 1 END) AS "LEVEL_1", COUNT(CASE WHEN G.LEVEL_NO = 2 THEN 1 END) AS "LEVEL_2", COUNT(CASE WHEN G.LEVEL_NO = 3 THEN 1 END) AS "LEVEL_3" FROM DATES D LEFT JOIN GAME_LOG G ON TRUNC(G.START_TIME) = D."date" GROUP BY D."date" ORDER BY D."date" ASC

SELECT LEVEL_NO AS "levelNo", COUNT(*) AS "playCount", COUNT(DISTINCT MEM_NO) AS "uniqueUsers", AVG(CLEAR_TIME) AS "avgClearTime", AVG(SCORE) AS "avgScore", MAX(SCORE) AS "maxScore", AVG(COMBO) AS "avgCombo", MAX(COMBO) AS "maxCombo" FROM GAME_LOG WHERE START_TIME BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 0.99999 GROUP BY LEVEL_NO ORDER BY LEVEL_NO ASC

WITH DATES AS ( SELECT TRUNC(SYSDATE) - LEVEL + 1 AS "date" FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= #{days, jdbcType=INTEGER} ), DAU AS ( SELECT TRUNC(START_TIME) AS "log_day", COUNT(DISTINCT MEM_NO) AS "user_count" FROM GAME_LOG WHERE START_TIME >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) - #{days, jdbcType=INTEGER} + 1 GROUP BY TRUNC(START_TIME) ) SELECT TO_CHAR(D."date", 'MM-DD') AS "LABEL", NVL(DAU."user_count", 0) AS "VALUE" FROM DATES D LEFT JOIN DAU ON D."date" = DAU."log_day" ORDER BY D."date" ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GAME_LOG WHERE TRUNC(START_TIME) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)

WITH DATES AS ( SELECT TRUNC(SYSDATE) - LEVEL + 1 AS "date" FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= #{days, jdbcType=INTEGER} ), RETURNING_USERS AS ( SELECT TRUNC(G.START_TIME) AS "log_day", COUNT(DISTINCT G.MEM_NO) AS "user_count" FROM GAME_LOG G JOIN MEMBER M ON G.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO WHERE G.START_TIME >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) - #{days, jdbcType=INTEGER} + 1 AND TRUNC(G.START_TIME) != TRUNC(M.CREATED_DATE) GROUP BY TRUNC(G.START_TIME) ) SELECT TO_CHAR(D."date", 'MM-DD') AS "LABEL", NVL(RU."user_count", 0) AS "VALUE" FROM DATES D LEFT JOIN RETURNING_USERS RU ON D."date" = RU."log_day" ORDER BY D."date" ASC

SELECT TO_CHAR(START_TIME, 'DY', 'NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=ENGLISH') AS "DAY_OF_WEEK", TO_CHAR(START_TIME, 'HH24') AS "HOUR_OF_DAY", COUNT(GAME_LOG_NO) AS "COUNT" FROM GAME_LOG WHERE -- üö® ÏàòÏ†ï: TIMESTAMP ÎπÑÍµêÎ•º DATE Î≥ÄÌôòÏúºÎ°ú ÏïàÏ†ïÌôî üö® START_TIME >= TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND START_TIME < TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1 -- Ï¢ÖÎ£åÏùº 23:59:59ÍπåÏßÄ Ìè¨Ìï® GROUP BY TO_CHAR(START_TIME, 'DY', 'NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=ENGLISH'), TO_CHAR(START_TIME, 'HH24') ORDER BY "HOUR_OF_DAY" ASC
